articles.title: Astronomer CEO placed on leave after Coldplay 'kiss cam' video appeared to show him embracing HR chief - Business Insider
articles.description: Astronomer CEO Andy Byron was placed on leave, the company said on X, after a viral video that appeared to show him embracing the company's HR chief.
articles.content:
Tech company Astronomer has placed its chief executive on leave after he appeared to be filmed embracing the company's head of HR, Kristin Cabot, at a Coldplay concert.
Astronomer said in a statemen… [+1501 chars]

articles.title: Taylor Russell Exits Michael B. Jordan’s ‘The Thomas Crown Affair’ Remake - Variety
articles.description: Taylor Russell will no longer star opposite Michael B. Jordan in 'The Thomas Crown Affair,' with production on the Amazon MGM Studios movie underway.
articles.content:
Taylor Russell has exited her role in Amazon MGM Studios’ reimagining of “The Thomas Crown Affair,” where she was set to star opposite Michael B. Jordan.
